official_title: A bill to clear certain impediments to the issuance of a certificate of documentation for a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade and fisheries.

titles.title: A bill to clear certain impediments to the issuance of a certificate of documentation for a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.
